0.1.name: wordpress/pc-ktai-content-selecter
0.1.description:
日本語の説明を読む

PC Ktai content selecter is a plug-in that switches the content displayed with the personal computer as the cellular phone.

When linked Websites are chiefly different in the cellular phone and the personal computer, it uses it. only in Japanese mobile phone,and required Ktai Style Plugin.
